Package edu.rit.image

Package edu.rit.image contains classes for creating image files.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BilevelPngWriter
    Class BilevelPngWriter provides an object for writing a bilevel PNG image.
    ByteImageQueue
    Class ByteImageQueue provides a queue of pixel rows for an image, with the pixel data stored using type byte.
    Color
    Class Color provides a color.
    ColorApngWriter
    Class ColorApngWriter provides an object for writing a 24-bit color APNG animated image.
    ColorArray
    Class ColorArray provides an array of colors.
    ColorImageQueue
    Class ColorImageQueue provides a queue of pixel rows for an image, with the pixel data stored using class ColorArray.
    ColorPngWriter
    Class ColorPngWriter provides an object for writing a 24-bit color PNG image.
    Gray
    Class Gray provides a gray shade.
    GrayArray
    Class GrayArray provides an array of gray shades.
    GrayImageQueue
    Class GrayImageQueue provides a queue of pixel rows for an image, with the pixel data stored using class GrayArray.
    GrayPngWriter
    Class GrayPngWriter provides an object for writing an 8-bit grayscale PNG image.
    ImageQueue
    Class ImageQueue is the abstract base class for a queue of pixel rows for an image.
    IndexPngWriter
    Class IndexPngWriter provides an object for writing an indexed color PNG image.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PixelUnit
    Enum PixelUnit enumerates the possible pixel dimension units in an image.

Package edu.rit.image Description

Package edu.rit.image contains classes for creating image files. The following image file formats are supported:

  • Bilevel PNG -- class BilevelPngWriter
  • Grayscale PNG -- class GrayPngWriter
  • Indexed color PNG -- class IndexPngWriter
  • 24-bit color PNG -- class ColorPngWriter

Package edu.rit.image also contains classes for creating animated image files. The following animated image file formats are supported:

  • 24-bit color APNG -- class ColorApngWriter
